prompts: Create a fierce dark-type Pokemon with a sleek black body and fiery accents.
I want a quadruped Pokemon that looks intimidating with sharp features and an edgy design.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies both darkness and flames, featuring glowing eyes and a spiky tail.
Make a Pokemon with a unique combination of dark and fire traits, showcasing a powerful stance.
Imagine a Pokemon that roams the mountains, with a striking appearance and a menacing aura.
Design a Pokemon that blends elegant design with a fierce battle-ready look, complete with armor.
Show me a dark and fiery Pokemon that thrives in rocky terrains, with an intimidating presence.
